node.title: Watch: Violent brawl breaks out inside New Jersey casino
node.description: One person was transported to a local medical centre with non-life-threatening injuries.
node.content: ["A video has captured a violent fight involving dozens of people inside a casino in Atlantic City last week.\u00a0", "Police in New Jersey said the fight occurred at Harrah's Resort just before 3am on Tuesday (local time), the Press reported.\u00a0", "One person was transported to AtlantiCare Regional Medical Center with injuries that weren't life-threatening, Lt. Kevin Fair said.", "Multiple US media outlets report the fight broke out between two lending companies while a realtors convention was being held in town.", "According to one site, the incident started after a group of New York mortgage brokers removed another drunk group from their party.", "\"A mortgage bank was hosting a party [and] another crew from a mortgage bank showed up wasted and sloppy,\" a witness told inman.com.", "\"They got kicked out [and] as retaliation, they waited till the party was over and jumped [the New Jersey brokers].\"", "The violent footage posted online starts by showing a lot of pushing and shoving in what appears to be a seating section at the resort before things escalate.\u00a0", "One man who is trying to grab someone in front of him is viciously punched in the head.\u00a0", "The footage moves back to the dining area where multiple men can be seen grabbing chairs and flinging them at other people.\u00a0", "People can be seen scrambling away from the brawl as multiple security guards try to step in.", "The violent scenes continue with men punching and kicking people that lie on the ground while others grab chairs as weapons and throw them at people.", "Police said the fight had already de-escalated by the time they arrived and no arrests were made because no one on the scene wanted to sign a criminal complaint.", "One witness told a US media outlet that he had to jump the railing to avoid getting involved.\u00a0", "\"There was a lot of physical violence. There was a chair that was smashed against someone,\" Minh Nguyen told Philadelphia's 6abc.", "\"Someone threw punches, there were sucker punches. We had to jump the railing and I helped my friend down.\u00a0", "\"There was physical violence happening inside and outside the food court.\"\u00a0"]
